long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swing Monkey invites players to embark on a lighthearted and entertaining adventure where swinging from vine to vine is the key to success. Developed for casual enjoyment, this game challenges you to guide a playful monkey through a vibrant jungle, swinging over obstacles and collecting bananas along the way.

Game Controls
Navigate the jungle canopy with these simple controls:

Mouse Click or Tap: Initiate a swing from vine to vine.
Hold Mouse Click or Tap: Extend the swing for a longer reach.
How to Play
Start Swinging: Click or tap to make the monkey grab a vine and swing.
Time Your Swings: Release the click or tap at the right moment to propel the monkey forward.
Collect Bananas: Swing towards clusters of bananas to increase your score.
Avoid Obstacles: Dodge obstacles like branches and birds that can impede your progress.
